thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 7 of 672
thread.title: Ryan Browne
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Ryan Browne

author: Ryan Browne
title: Ryan Browne
text:
This is the second time I have used framesdirect.com and I have been impressed both times. They have a better selection than anywhere else I've seen, better prices, and an excellent customer service staff.
I made a mistake on my billing information and it was corrrected immediately when I brought it to their attention. Because of their quick work to fix MY mistake, my order arrived without delay. This is rare in an online retailer these days.
